plays.text: Penalty to Mike Comrie 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Mike Comrie 5 minutes for Elbowing Peter Forsberg served by Ales Hemsky
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Dan Hinote and Martin Skoula
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Obstruction - Tripping Mike York
Penalty to Greg de Vries 2 minutes for Interference Jason Chimera
Goal scored by Mike York unassisted
Penalty to Martin Skoula 2 minutes for Hooking Jason Chimera
Penalty to Radim Vrbata 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Derek Morris 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ryan Smyth
Goal scored by Eric Messier assisted by Rob Blake
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Anson Carter assisted by Janne Niinimaa and Todd Marchant
Penalty to Dan Cleary 2 minutes for Hooking Derek Morris
Goal scored by Dean McAmmond assisted by Steve Reinprecht and Greg de Vries
Penalty to Jason Smith 2 minutes for Roughing Steve Reinprecht
Goal scored by Georges Laraque assisted by Jiri Dopita and Jason Chimera
Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Crosschecking Steve Reinprecht
Goal scored by Jason Chimera assisted by Steve Staios and Todd Marchant
